attributes.action: GIVE US ACCESS TO OUR OLYMPIC PARK
attributes.additional_details: Apparently the Olympic Park will only be open for a few weeks after the Olympics have finished, after which it will close - presumably so that the Government can decide how they can best make money out of it. We, the public have paid for this facility and should be allowed to enjoy it in the future, especially as many of us have been either unable to afford or unable to aquire any tickets for events or even day passes to the park.
